body: The username I usually use is 4 characters long. I had to make it 5. I died inside. Also this is my first post, and I'm learning how this works. :)

title: Username

guild.description:
### What is this?

Hub is the place to talk about whatever you want! Nothing is off topic here. You can do things such as sharing asking questions, sharing images, making a joke, ranting, sharing a meme, sharing any piece of info you want to share, and much more.

---
---

### Rules:  
  
**1, Follow Ruqqus site-wide rules**  

Your content must comply with the [Ruqqus Content Policy](https://ruqqus.com/help/rules).  
 
Violations will be reported to the admins and offenders will be exiled.  

---

**2, No spam**

Flooding this guild with content that doesn't contribute to any discussion or breaks the rules counts as spam.

---

**3, Don't be an asshole**

 - Be nice to your fellow users
 - Don't drag discussion down the Pyramid of Debate.  

![](https://i.imgur.com/6SsqySI.png)

---
---

**Guild banner by @WarMuse**
guild.description_html:

  • Don't drag discussion down the Pyramid of Debate.

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

body:
Me too :/

I wanted my name to be "cqtz", but I couldn't, so I chose an entirely different name.

I hope the devs (specifically, captainmeta4, I think, since [kek doesn't have an issue with usernames less than 5 characters long](https://ruqqus.com/post/f3d/why-did-you-choose-your-username "You may have to scroll down a bit")) respond to [this post](https://ruqqus.com/post/wq7/why-is-the-a-minimum-character).
body_html:
Me too :/

I wanted my name to be "cqtz", but I couldn't, so I chose an entirely different name.

I hope the devs (specifically, captainmeta4, I think, since kek doesn't have an issue with usernames less than 5 characters long) respond to this post.

Oh, that sucks... One of my favorite parts about migrating here is that I somehow managed to claim this OG username before anyone else. I always wanted it on Reddit.

ur username is still cool
